version_description:
* iOS 8 Extension: added ability to remove Metadata after the main app's In-App Purchase to remove Metadata
* From the main app (not extension), can now open the location of the image in Google Maps now, in addition to the Apple Maps App

* iOS 8 Extension: added ability to remove Metadata after the main app's In-App Purchase to remove Metadata
* From the main app (not extension), can now open the location of the image in Google Maps now, in addition to the Apple Maps App
* Updated Art
* Updated Art

This is a huge update!

The photo picker has been upgraded with:
* * A Photo Map of all your GPS photos
* * Sorting options: created date, edited date, or media type

Edit Metadata Changes:
* * Add a caption. Keep track of the story

This is a huge update!

The photo picker has been upgraded with:
* * A Photo Map of all your GPS photos
* * Sorting options: created date, edited date, or media type

Edit Metadata Changes:
* * Add a caption. Keep track of the story

3.0 is a huge update!
3.0.1 fixes the extension and a crash in the main app.

The photo picker has been upgraded with:
* * A Photo Map of all your GPS photos
* * Sorting options: created date, edited date, or media type

Edit Metadat

3.0 is a huge update!
3.0.1 fixes the extension and a crash in the main app.

The photo picker has been upgraded with:
* * A Photo Map of all your GPS photos
* * Sorting options: created date, edited date, or media type

Edit Metadat

3.0.2 fixes some photo picker issues
The photo picker will save your position in an album
Now showing iTunes synced photos
Tap a sort button again to change sort order
Fixed a bug when locating yourself from the Photo Map
Fixed a bug with e

3.0.2 fixes some photo picker issues
The photo picker will save your position in an album
Now showing iTunes synced photos
Tap a sort button again to change sort order
Fixed a bug when locating yourself from the Photo Map
Fixed a bug with e

3.0.3 fixes iOS8 compatibility

3.0 was a huge update:
The photo picker has been upgraded with:
* * A Photo Map of all your GPS photos
* * Sorting options: created date, edited date, or media type

3.0.3 fixes iOS8 compatibility

3.0 was a huge update:
The photo picker has been upgraded with:
* * A Photo Map of all your GPS photos
* * Sorting options: created date, edited date, or media type

Edit Metadata Changes:
* * Add a

Many tiny fixes and improvements throughout the app.

Thank you for using the Photo Investigator!

Many tiny fixes and improvements throughout the app.

Thank you for using the Photo Investigator!

When removing or editing metadata, the main app now asks if you'd like to remove the old photo.
Improved Reliability

When removing or editing metadata, the main app now asks if you'd like to remove the old photo.
Improved Reliability

This update is all from direct user feedback. Thank you for using the app and purchasing the unlock!

Added a "Today" button when editing a Photo's time.
Added the ability to enter seconds when editing time.
The map now zooms to your location

This update is all from direct user feedback. Thank you for using the app and purchasing the unlock!

Added a "Today" button when editing a Photo's time.
Added the ability to enter seconds when editing time.
The map now zooms to your location

* Extension Redesigned:
View a photo's location from Messages, Photos, and other apps.
To setup the extension,
1) View a picture in Photos or Messages
2) Press the share button

Added a new "drawer" in the main app which includes the image size, format, file size, and file name.
File name is now also displayed in the extension.
The app has been translated into Spanish.

The main page has been beautifully redesigned, many bugs fixed, and more kinds of metadata are shown!

NEW METADATA DISPLAYED:
* See the ALBUMS a photo/video is in!
* View DEPTH MAPS in portrait photos!
Select a portrait photo
